title: In addition to above the Authority may add or alter the above list from time to time
clause_text: In addition to above the Authority may add or alter the above list from time to time. No permanent construction or permanent use, except as a playground, shall be permissible in this reservation.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In addition to above the Authority may add or alter the above list from time to time. No permanent construction or permanent use, except as a playground, shall be permissible in this reservation.
